mapper.select: select s.shop_NO, s.member_NO, s.shop_name, s.shop_address, s.shop_code, s.shop_latitude, s.shop_longitude, s.shop_joinDate, sd.shopDetail_NO, sd.shop_NO, sd.shop_ceo, shop_phone, shop_open_time, shop_close_time, shop_introduce, shop_starScore, shop_imageMain, shop_imageSub, shop_heartScore, shop_reserveScore, shopDetail_joinDate from t_member m, t_shop s, t_shopDetail sd where m.member_no = s.member_no and s.shop_no = sd.shop_no and m.member_status = '1' order by s.shop_joinDate asc

select s.shop_NO, s.member_NO, s.shop_name, s.shop_address, s.shop_code, s.shop_latitude, s.shop_longitude, s.shop_joinDate, d.shopDetail_NO, d.shop_NO, d.shop_ceo, d.shop_phone, d.shop_open_time, d.shop_close_time, d.shop_introduce, d.shop_starScore, d.shop_imageMain, d.shop_imageSub, d.shop_heartScore, d.shop_reserveScore,d.shopDetail_joinDate from t_shop s left join t_shopDetail d on d.shop_NO = s.shop_NO where s.shop_NO = #{shop_NO}
select s.shop_NO, s.member_NO, s.shop_name, s.shop_address, s.shop_code, s.shop_latitude, s.shop_longitude, s.shop_joinDate from t_shop s where s.shop_NO = #{shop_NO}
mapper.insert: insert into t_shop(shop_NO, member_NO, shop_name, shop_address, shop_code, shop_latitude, shop_longitude) values(seq_shop.nextval, #{member_NO}, #{shop_name}, #{shop_address}, #{shop_code}, #{shop_latitude}, #{shop_longitude})

insert into t_shopDetail(shopDetail_NO, shop_NO, shop_ceo, shop_phone, shop_open_time, shop_close_time) values(seq_shopDetail.nextval, #{shop_NO}, #{shop_ceo}, #{shop_phone}, #{shop_open_time}, #{shop_close_time})
mapper.select: select shop_NO from t_shop where member_NO=#{member_NO}
